titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2427) to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to promulgate regulations for the reimportation of prescription drugs, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 95.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-231, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2427.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 335.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 335.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 10 (Roll no. 439).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/24/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2427 (Pharmaceutical Market Access Act of 2003).
